description: A React component for editing and viewing notes in a note-taking application. It supports editing mode, deletion, and auto-focus features, handling both display and input for note's title and content.

methods.name: NoteEditor
methods.description: React functional component for editing/displaying a note with UI controls for editing, saving, and deleting.

methods.name: handleSave
methods.description: Handles saving the note after editing by invoking onSave with updated note data and toggling edit mode off.
